files.file: #!/bin/sh # auto-generated by DefaultRoute service (utility.py) ip route add default via 10.2.2.254 ip route add default via 2001:2:2::254

# DNS database file domain .ggm @ DEFAULT ggm. TTL DEFAULT 86400 @ SOASP s1.ggm TTL @ SOAADMIN admin\.ggm. TTL @ SOASERIAL 1 TTL @ SOAREFRESH 60 TTL @ SOARETRY 3600 TTL @ SOAEXPIRE 604800 TTL @ NS sp.ggm. TTL @ NS ss1.ggm. TTL 1 @ NS ss2.ggm. TTL 2 # Primary server of cc.ggm subdomain cc.@ NS sp.cc.@ TTL @ MX ms1.@ TTL @ MX ms2.@ TTL sp A 10.2.2.1:2000 TTL ss1 A 10.3.3.1:2000 TTL ss2 A 10.4.4.1:2000 TTL sp.cc A 10.1.1.2:2000 TTL mike A 10.1.1.3 TTL gui A 10.4.4.1 TTL gabs A 10.3.3.2 TTL ms1 A 10.3.3.1 TTL ms2 A 10.3.3.3 TTL miguel CNAME mike TTL guilherme CNAME gui TTL gabriela CNAME gabs TTL
# List of root files for topology 10.2.2.1:2000 10.3.3.1:2000
cp -r /home/core/ProjetoCC/src/* dns/src
python3 dns/src/run_server.py dns/files/config_files/servidor1.txt 2000 5 0 shy

@ DEFAULT root. TTL DEFAULT 86400 # Config data @ SOAADMIN mike\.ggm TTL @ SOASERIAL 1 TTL # Name servers root. NS s1. TTL root. NS s2. TTL ggm. NS sp.ggm. TTL ggm. NS ss1.ggm. TTL ggm. NS ss2.ggm. TTL fcp. NS sp.fcp. TTL fcp. NS ss1.fcp. TTL fcp. NS ss2.fcp. TTL reverse. NS ns1.reverse. TTL # Addresses sp.ggm. A 10.2.2.1:2000 TTL ss1.ggm. A 10.3.3.1:2000 TTL ss2.ggm. A 10.4.4.1:2000 TTL sp.fcp. A 10.2.2.2:2000 TTL ss1.fcp. A 10.3.3.2:2000 TTL ss2.fcp. A 10.4.4.3:2000 TTL sp.reverse. A 10.3.3.2:2000 TTL s1. A 10.2.2.1:2000 TTL s2. A 10.3.3.1:2000 TTL
echo "# -- gerado pela script de arranque..." >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "domain cc.pt" >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "nameserver 10.2.2.1" >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "" >> /etc/resolv.conf

# Configuration file for primary server for ggm domain ggm DB dns/files/db_files/ggm.db ggm SS 10.3.3.1:2000 ggm SS 10.4.1.1:2000 ggm LG dns/files/log_files/ggm.log all LG dns/files/log_files/all.log root ST dns/files/rootservers.db . DB dns/files/db_files/root.db . LG dns/files/log_files/root.log
#!/bin/sh # auto-generated by DefaultRoute service (utility.py) ip route add default via 10.2.2.254 ip route add default via 2001:2:2::254
# List of root files for topology 10.2.2.1:2000 10.3.3.1:2000
cp -r /home/core/ProjetoCC/src/* dns/src
python3 dns/src/run_server.py dns/files/config_files/servidor2.txt 2000 5 0 shy

# DNS database file for domain .fcp @ DEFAULT fcp. TTL DEFAULT 86400 @ SOASP ns1.fcp. TTL @ SOAADMIN admin.\fcp. TTL @ SOASERIAL 1 TTL @ SOAREFRESH 14400 TTL @ SOARETRY 3600 TTL @ SOAEXPIRE 604800 TTL # Name servers @ NS ns1.fcp. TTL @ NS ns2.fcp. TTL @ NS ns3.fcp. TTL taremi.@ NS ns1.taremi.fcp. TTL # MAIL SERVERS @ MX ms1.fcp. TTL # Addresses ns1 A 10.2.2.2:2000 TTL ns2 A 10.3.3.2:2000 TTL ns3 A 10.4.4.3:2000 TTL ns1.taremi A 10.4.4.1:2000 TTL ms1 A 10.2.2.1 TTL pdc A 10.4.4.1 TTL avb A 10.4.4.2 TTL sp CNAME ns1 TTL ss1 CNAME ns2 TTL ss2 CNAME ns3 TTL mail1 CNAME ms1 TTL
echo "# -- gerado pela script de arranque..." >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "domain cc.pt" >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "nameserver 10.2.2.1" >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "" >> /etc/resolv.conf

# Configuration file for server 2 fcp DB dns/files/db_files/fcp.db fcp SS 10.3.3.2:2000 fcp SS 10.4.4.3:2000 fcp LG dns/files/log_files/fcp.log all LG dns/files/log_files/all.log root ST dns/files/rootservers.db

#!/bin/sh # auto-generated by StaticRoute service (utility.py) # # NOTE: this service must be customized to be of any use # Below are samples that you can uncomment and edit. # #/sbin/ip route add 10.9.8.0/24 via 10.4.4.254 #/sbin/ip route add 3ffe:4::/64 via 2001:4:4::254
#!/bin/sh # auto-generated by DefaultRoute service (utility.py) ip route add default via 10.1.1.254 ip route add default via 2001:1:1::254
# List of root files for topology 10.2.2.1:2000 10.3.3.1:2000

# Configuration file for "portatil1" 10.in-addr.reverse. DB dns/files/db_files/10_in-addr_reverse.db 10.in-addr.reverse. LG dns/files/log_files/10_in-addr_reverse.log all LG dns/files/log_files/all.log root ST dns/files/rootservers.db
cp -r /home/core/ProjetoCC/src/* dns/src/
python3 dns/src/client.py 10.2.2.1:2000 mike.ggm. A
python3 dns/src/run_server.py dns/files/config_files/portatil1.txt 2000 5 0 shy
echo "# -- gerado pela script de arranque..." >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "domain cc.pt" >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "nameserver 10.2.2.1" >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "" >> /etc/resolv.conf

# DNS database file for domain 10.in-addr.reverse @ DEFAULT 10.in-addr.reverse. TTL DEFAULT 86400 @ SOASP ns1.10.in-addr.reverse. TTL @ SOADMIN gabs\.ggm TTL @ SOASERIAL 1 TTL @ SOAREFRESH 14400 TTL @ SOARETRY 3600 @ SOAEXPIRE 604800 TTL # Name servers @ NS ns1.10.in-addr.reverse. TTL # Addresses ns1 A 10.1.1.1:2000 TTL # Reverse DNS 10.2.2.2 PTR sp.fcp. 10.4.4.3 PTR ss2.fcp. 10.1.1.2 PTR sp.cc.ggm.

#!/bin/sh # auto-generated by StaticRoute service (utility.py) # # NOTE: this service must be customized to be of any use # Below are samples that you can uncomment and edit. # #/sbin/ip route add 10.9.8.0/24 via 10.4.4.254 #/sbin/ip route add 3ffe:4::/64 via 2001:4:4::254

# DNS database file for domain cc.ggm @ DEFAULT cc.ggm. TTL DEFAULT 86400 @ SOASP ns1.cc.ggm. TTL @ SOADMIN admin\.cc.ggm. TTL @ SOASERIAL 1 TTL @ SOAREFRESH 14400 TTL @ SOARETRY 3600 @ SOAEXPIRE 604800 TTL # Name servers @ NS ns1.cc.ggm. TTL @ NS ns2.cc.ggm. TTL @ NS ns3.cc.ggm. TTL # MAIL SERVERS @ MX ms1.@ TTL # Addresses ns1 A 10.1.1.2:2000 TTL ns2 A 10.4.4.2:2000 TTL ns3 A 10.3.3.3:2000 TTL ms1 A 10.4.4.2 TTL tone A 10.1.1.1 TTL tunes A 10.1.1.3 TTL sp CNAME ns1 TTL ss1 CNAME ns2 TTL ss2 CNAME ns3 TTL
# List of root files for topology 10.2.2.1:2000 10.3.3.1:2000
cp -r /home/core/ProjetoCC/src/* dns/src
python3 dns/src/run_server.py dns/files/config_files/portatil2.txt 2000 5 0 shy
echo "# -- gerado pela script de arranque..." >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "domain cc.pt" >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "nameserver 10.2.2.1" >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "" >> /etc/resolv.conf

# Configuration file for "portatil2" # SP cc.ggm cc.ggm SS 10.4.4.2:2000 cc.ggm SS 10.3.3.3:2000 cc.ggm LG dns/files/log_files/cc_ggm.log all LG dns/files/log_files/all.log root ST dns/files/rootservers.db

# Configuration file "Grilo" # SS ggm ggm SP 10.2.2.1:2000 ggm LG dns/files/log_files/ggm.log all LG dns/files/log_files/all.log root ST dns/files/rootservers.db # SP taremi.fcp taremi.fcp SS 10.1.1.3:2000 taremi.fcp SS 10.2.2.3:2000 taremi.fcp DB dns/files/db_files/taremi_fcp.db taremi.fcp LG dns/files/log_files/taremi_fcp.log all LG dns/files/log_files/all.log root ST dns/files/rootservers.db

# DNS database file for domain taremi.fcp @ DEFAULT .taremi.fcp TTL DEFAULT 86400 @ SOASP ns1.taremi.fcp. TTL @ SOAADMIN admin\.taremin.fcp. TTL @ SOASERIAL 1 TTL @ SOAREFRESH 14400 TTL @ SOARETRY 3600 TTL @ SOAEXPIRE 604800 TTL # Name servers @ NS ns1.taremi.fcp. TTL @ NS ns2.taremi.fcp. TTL @ NS ns3.taremi.fcp. TTL # MAIL SERVERS @ MX ms1.@ TTL # Addresses ns1 A 10.4.4.1:2000 TTL ns2 A 10.1.1.3:2000 TTL ns3 A 10.2.2.3:2000 TTL taremi A 10.3.3.3 TTL pepe A 10.4.4.3 TTL zaidu A 10.3.3.2 TTL ms1 A 10.3.3.1 TTL sp CNAME ns1 TTL ss1 CNAME ns2 TTL ss2 CNAME ns3 TTL
echo "# -- gerado pela script de arranque..." >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "domain cc.pt" >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "nameserver 10.2.2.1" >> /etc/resolv.conf echo "" >> /etc/resolv.conf

configuration.name: annotation a20
configuration.value: {iconcoords {312.0 530.0}} {type text} {label {Link 100 Mbps, 5 milisec, loss=5%, dup=10% (cyan)}} {labelcolor #8900b0} {fontfamily {Arial}} {fontsize {10}} {effects {bold}} {canvas c1}

configuration.name: global_options
configuration.value: interface_names=no ip_addresses=yes ipv6_addresses=no node_labels=yes link_labels=yes show_api=no background_images=no annotations=yes grid=yes traffic_start=0
